record.val: For our fallen brother, we claim our revenge.
What? What use is speech? If you will not submit, you must be destroyed.

%Rank %PCName, the healer Urjorad is (...) --- arvisrend: This greeting should never appear.
Welcome, %PCName. Welcome, Urshilaku Nerevarine. I have only these few humble items to offer you. Or, perhaps, there is something you wish to discuss?

Adusamsi Assurnarairan has told me how you rescued her, and begs me to give you this as a token of her gratitude. From what she says, your task was not easy. I celebrate you, and your courage and determination. Whatever you managed to find at Rotheran is yours to keep and use in the service of the Imperial cult. Thank you again, and speak to me when you are ready to undertake another of the Oracle's Quests.
Welcome, %PCName. Welcome, Urshilaku Nerevarine. I have only these few humble items to offer you. Or, perhaps, there is something you wish to discuss?
I delivered the wolfsbane petals to Fallaise.

Apparently, one of the Morag Tong's assassins has been taking jobs outside of the order, and the Daedra demands vengeance. If I can find this rogue assassin, Balyn Omarel, and kill him, Mephala will reward me. Of course, Mephala wishes this to be done in silence, away from nosy town guards, so I am to poison him. He lives in Balmora.
Drulene Falen thanked me for killing the mudcrabs that were bothering her guar.
